items.name: Decoys
items.effect: `+1 DT` to `Search`. Half are fake. Placing player decides. Reveal on `Search`

items.name: Drop Zone
items.effect: `+1 DT` to `Search`. Place delivery points instead of `Loot Markers`. At each round start, 1 `Loot Marker` drops at a random point

items.name: Heavy
items.effect: `-1 DT` to `Search`. All `Loot Markers` are Heavy. Needs 2 friendly models within 1" to `Search`

items.name: Locked
items.effect: `-2 DT` to `Search`. 2 consecutive activations adjacent to unlock. Attack or move breaks sequence

items.name: Extraction
items.effect: `-2 DT` to `Search`. Carry off board to score. No Performance Review
